meanings.definition: A wager or agreement between two parties where the parties stake money or valuables on the outcome of an event or contest.
meanings.sent1: My friend and I made a bet on who would win the race.
meanings.sent2: Betting on sports events can be exciting but risky.
meanings.sent3: I lost the bet and had to buy my friend lunch.
meanings.sent4: Life is like a bet, you never know what the outcome will be.
meanings.sent5: The bet between them added an element of thrill to the game.

meanings.definition: To risk money or valuables on the outcome of an event or contest.
meanings.sent1: I will bet $10 on the horse with the best odds.
meanings.sent2: People often bet on card games for fun.
meanings.sent3: I bet my lucky coin will bring me good luck today.
meanings.sent4: She bet her savings on the stock market and doubled her money.
meanings.sent5: Don't bet more than you can afford to lose.

meanings.definition: To be certain or confident about something.
meanings.sent1: I bet it will rain tomorrow based on the dark clouds.
meanings.sent2: He bet that his team would win the championship.
meanings.sent3: I bet you can't finish that huge burger in one sitting!
meanings.sent4: She always bets on herself to succeed in any challenge.
meanings.sent5: I bet you'll love the movie, it's really funny!
